captions.text:
It's Mark Wiens here, I'm in Delhi, India,
and I'm about to eat one of the coolest ice

cream, I think I've ever had in my entire
life.

Ok, so I ordered the mango version, and it's
actually a mango hollowed out, and then they

put cream and other spices and stuff in it,
and then freeze it all in the mango. And then

they seal it with clay at the top, seal it
up, and then when you order it, it's hard

in the deep freeze, and they slice it up into
pieces.

So there's actually real mango on the outside
and on the inside is the ice cream, mango

ice cream, so, by far the coolest mango ice
cream I've ever eaten, kulfi, mango kulfi.

Awww, that's really cold, and really good.
Super creamy, really mango-ey, mmm, that's
Ohhh, that's very nice. Oh yah!

title: Mango Kulfi - Amazing Indian Ice Cream!

comments.text:
I know to Westerners, using bare hands and buckets seem Unhygienic, but in 
India, we have been used to Eating outside food in a way such as this, and 
so we Indians have basically built an immunity to many diseases that could 
pop up from unhygienic cooking. However, as of today, India has been taking 
steps towards better, cleaner, and hygienic diet. The government has even 
announced a new mission just few months ago called "Clean India Campaign", 
so we are progressing quickly.  No matter what though, Indian food is 
always bomb.﻿

comments.text:

basic stuff.
comments.author: Chelsea M.

comments.text:

comments.author: Ariel Zhong

comments.text:
+Ariel Zhong  I tell you to go read about it so that you can learn 
yourself. Most people don't just accept what others tell them, and prefer 
to gain their knowledge through their own research. If there's anything I 
have learned from my psychology courses that I could apply to YouTube, it's 
that.

*Correlation does not equal causation*
Anorexic people are skinny, but because someone's skinny doesn't mean they 
have the disorder Anorexia. There is a level of seriousness to calling 
someone anorexic that quite a few people don't understand, because they do 
not think of the consequences.
comments.author: Chelsea M.

comments.text:
+Chelsea McCluer You're stupid if you can't explain it yourself and tell
